General.Name: Hengxin Mobile Business
General.Description: Hengxin Shambala Culture Co.,Ltd. engages in CG and CV technology business. It is involved in the CG/VR content production; children's whole industry chain development and operation; and LBE city new entertainment products. The company was formerly known as Hengxin Mobile Business Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Hengxin Shambala Culture Co., Ltd. in June 2017. Hengxin Shambala Culture Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

0.Name: Ms. Wei  Chen
0.Title: Chief Financial Officer and Deputy Gen. Mang.
